replies.msg:
Degree係econ＆business econ不過econ類好似好乞食

有依堆可以揀不過諗緊A&F或者Financial Economics
Accounting and Finance
Economics of Management and Organisation
Industrial dynamics and Strategy
Financial Economics
Financial Accounting
International Economics
Management Accounting
Marketing
Policy Economics
Urban Port and Transport Economics

有個奇怪嘅物流經濟好少見不過係咪都應該冇乜需求
